channel.title: Draft Charts on Leagify
channel.description: Recent content in Draft Charts on Leagify

item.title: 2026 Draft Prospects as of February 20
item.description: The underwear olympics are coming! With the NFL Combine approaching, here are the latest draft prospect rankings.

item.title: 2026 Draft Prospects as of January 21
item.description: Indiana are the national champs! Who had THAT on their bingo card two years ago? Anyway, here are the latest draft prospect rankings.

item.title: 2027 Draft Prospects as of January 21
item.description: It’s never too early to start looking ahead! Here are the first rankings for the 2027 NFL Draft class.

item.title: 2026 Draft Prospects as of December 31
item.description: Have you made any resolutions? Maybe to follow draft prospects?

item.title: 2026 Draft Prospects as of December 10
item.description: The regular season is basically over, but the bowls have only just begun! What’s going on with the 2026 draft prospects?

item.title: 2026 Draft Prospects as of November 23
item.description: Thanksgiving is nearing. Are you thankful for your team or looking at ways to improve it via the draft? Here are some interactive charts visualizing 2026 NFL Draft prospect data. Hover over chart segments to see detailed information.

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Prospects as of October 22
item.description: Interactive charts visualizing 2026 NFL Draft prospect data. Hover over chart segments to see detailed information.

item.title: 2026 NFL Draft Prospects as of October 4
item.description: Interactive charts visualizing 2026 NFL Draft prospect data. Hover over chart segments to see detailed information.

item.title: 2025 NFL Draft Prospects as of March 31
item.description: Do you hear the rumble? Green Bay is getting ready for the draft! It’s gonna happen!

item.title: 2024 NFL Draft Prospects
item.description: Once more into the breach, my friends! It’s 2024 draft season!

item.title: 2023 NFL Draft Prospects - Last charts before the draft!
item.description: The smokescreens are out, and people have been talking about prospects so long, it’s sounding like jibberish. It’s almost draft time!

item.title: 2023 NFL Draft Prospects - First charts of the year!
item.description: The Super Bowl is done. The confetti has fallen and the drunken parades are over. It’s draft season!

item.title: 2022 NFL Draft Prospects - Less than a month away!
item.description: It’s April, and the NFL Draft is scheduled for April 28th! It’s only a few weeks away!

item.title: 2022 NFL Draft Prospects - Bringing in the new year!
item.description: 2022 is fast approaching! Are you thinking about the draft yet?

item.title: 2021 NFL Draft Prospects - Two weeks before the draft
item.description: It seems like teams are already on the clock, but the draft is still two weeks away. What does the future hold for these young men?

item.title: 2021 NFL Draft Prospects - Ranks after the National Championship
item.description: The Jets failed at tanking. The Jaguars were even better at losing! Also, Alabama kicked everyone’s butts in the playoff, so all of the “normal” college football games are over. Let’s see some charts!

item.title: 2021 NFL Draft Prospects - Initial ranks!
item.description: It sounds like the Jets may already be tanking, so let’s see who they might be able to choose!

item.title: 2020 NFL Draft Prospects - April Mocks
item.description: Draft mocking has turned into an industry. Let’s add to the pile!

item.title: 2020 NFL Draft Prospects - April Showers
item.description: The draft is going to be virtual, but it’s still happening. Let’s see some charts!

item.title: 2020 NFL Draft Prospects - Mocking up a Storm
item.description: Everyone has been put in quarantine, but one thing hasn’t been forbidden: Mock Drafts!

item.title: 2020 Draft Prospects - After the Combine
item.description: The NFL Combine, also known as the Underwear Olympics, has completed. Pro Days and mindless speculation are still to follow, but you can get some charts now!

item.title: 2020 NFL Draft Prospects - The New Year
item.description: The college football season is nearly over, and most NFL teams are done playing. The draft is getting a little more attention now!

item.title: 2019 XFL Draft Review
item.description: The YouTube livestream may have been disappointing, but it’s still football! Let’s find out more about where these players came from.

item.title: 2020 NFL Draft Prospects - The circle of life.
item.description: The draft is still a long way off, and the college football season is less than halfway complete, but it’s never too early to start thinking about the draft!

item.title: 2019 NFL Draft Prospects - Final rankings before the big event!
item.description: We are nearly on the clock. The Draft is fast approaching.

item.title: 2019 NFL Draft Prospects - Now with updated charts
item.description: I’ve made some updates to some existing charts and I’ve created a new chart, as well. Feel free to take a look!

item.title: 2019 NFL Draft Prospects - As of April 12th
item.description: The National champ has been crowned, the all-star games have been played, the combine is over, and the pro days are done. It’s “lying season”, where agents and general managers spin tall tales and play the game of NFL thrones. The draft is nearly upon us. Check out what’s to come!

item.title: A History of NFL Draft Value from 2014 to 2018
item.description: Looking at our past can help inform our future. Let’s use the last 5 years of draft data to get a sneak peek into our history.

item.title: NFL Draft Prospects - 2019 - As of March 9
item.description: Free agency is in full swing, as overpriced veterans are switching teams to teams in varying states of desperation. The draft is still approaching, however. Check out what’s to come!

item.title: New Packers GM - What to expect?
item.description: Packer fans are bracing for their first GM change in a few years. What about Brian Gutekunst’s scouting past can be examined by looking at the Packers record of acquiring draft picks and undrafted free agents?

item.title: NFL Draft Prospects - 2018
item.description: The season isn’t over, but with some teams already eliminated from the playoffs, our eyes veer toward the draft. Check it out!

item.title: Winter Olympics Predictions - Russia is OUT!
item.description: The IOC has ruled that Russia is out of the 2018 Olympics. How does that change the potential medalists?

item.title: Winter Olympics Predictions
item.description: We are the champions, my friend. The best in the world come together in the spirit of cooperation and sport. Who will win?

item.title: Intro To Draft Charts
item.description: Welcome to the draft charts section! Read this to figure out how to read charts, as well as how to make charts of your own.
